Package net.sf.sprockets.content

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Content
    Constants and utility methods for working with ContentResolvers.
    Content.Query
    Holds parameters that are used in a query.
    CursorWrapperLoader<D extends Cursor>
    A loader that queries the ContentResolver and returns a wrapped Cursor.
    DbContentProvider
    ContentProvider with a SQLite database back end that implements all common database operations and notifies observers of changes.
    DbContentProvider.Sql
    Elements of a SQL statement that have been derived from a URI.
    EasyCursorLoader
    Wraps the loaded cursor in an EasyCursor.
    GooglePlacesLoader<T>
    Loader that sends requests to Google Places API services and provides the responses.
    Intents
    Utility methods for working with Intents.
    LocalCursorLoader
    Provides the current location to implementations before performing the cursor query.
    Managers
    Utility methods for working with system services and other Managers.
    MutableQuery
    Modifiable implementation of Query.
    MutableSql
    Modifiable implementation of Sql.
    ReadCursorLoader
    Wraps the loaded cursor in a ReadCursor.
